Description:
Windows DCE-RPC functions which indicate a persistence techniques on the remote system. All credit for the Zeek mapping of the suspicious endpoint/operation field goes to MITRE.

Author: @neu5ron, SOC Prime
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: MITRE BZAR Indicators for Persistence
Query: sourcetype='zeek-dce_rpc' eql select * from _source_ where ((endpoint = 'spoolss' and operation = 'rpcaddmonitor') or (endpoint = 'spoolss' and operation = 'rpcaddprintprocessor') or (endpoint = 'iremotewinspool' and operation = 'rpcasyncaddmonitor') or (endpoint = 'iremotewinspool' and operation = 'rpcasyncaddprintprocessor') or (endpoint = 'iseclogon' and operation = 'seclcreateprocesswithlogonw') or (endpoint = 'iseclogon' and operation = 'seclcreateprocesswithlogonexw'))
